title: SURIOTA / SURGE-WSI Logo Concept
prompt: Create a modern minimalist logo for 'SURGE-WSI' trading system by SURIOTA. Concept: Combine a rising wave/surge motif with financial chart elements. The wave should suggest upward momentum and intelligence (subtle brain/neural pattern integration). Include the letters 'S' and 'W' stylized within the design. Primary mark should work as an icon. Color variations: Primary (blue #3B82F6 and cyan #06B6D4 gradient), Monochrome (white on dark), and Accent (with gold #F59E0B highlights). Show: Main logo, Icon-only version, and Wordmark 'SURGE-WSI' with 'by SURIOTA' tagline. Clean vector style suitable for app icons, trading terminals, and documentation. Professional fintech branding aesthetic.
negative_prompt: complex gradients, too many elements, hard to reproduce at small size, dated style, clip art
